channel.title: Where is the wallet.json file for the Radix Desktop Wallet stored?
channel.description:
The location of the wallet.json file is dependent on the operating system you are using:
Win: `%APPDATA%\radix-olympia-desktop-wallet` Mac: `~/Library/Application Support/radix-olympia-desktop-wallet` Linux: `~/.config/radix-olympia-desktop-wallet` Linux: `$XDG_CONFIG_HOME/radix-olympia-desktop-wallet`
### Further reading: https://learn.radixdlt.com/article/how-to-completely-reset-your-desktop-wallet-by-deleting-the-keystore
